name: mr_pete
text: I want to help Beef feel better, but he is in that place where a dude knows the man has to get himself out from. To see this thing in a friend is hard.

name: killerlimpet
text:
Yeah I've seen this too. From both sides.
Mostly I try to introduce them to Achewood so they'll have Beef to look up to.

name: saint
text: the man has noble intentions, though.

name: somanywhales
text: completely all chinese and stuff

name: apocowarg
text: I actually share this dream with RB only not a specific nationality or degree. I'd like to marry an endless string of foreign women and help them obtain their green cards before they dump me. This way my stories always seem fresh and new. Also I could learn bits and pieces of different languages and then bust them all out in the same conversation to look like a badass. A [i]learned[/i/] badass.

name: mattylite
text:
Maybe one of them would be from the internet[/i/], and they could teach you [i]BBCode .
(Also, I chubbied your comment so I wouldn't feel bad about making this one).

name: apocowarg
text: I don't know what makes the sun shine in my brainmeat more. The super gentle way you scolded me for my failure or the beautiful timing of your failure. Thank you, mattylite, you have given me a smile basket.

name: mattylite
text: I make my self feel better about it by thinking it helps my argument.  I imagine if I thought harder it might not stay true.

name: laserblade
text: I just thought it was ironic.

name: snowman
text: EMBARRASSING!!

name: soticoto
text:
To be fair... I have done something akin to this.
She was Canadian.
It was nice while it lasted.

name: slab64
text: I totally thought this was going to lead to another Ultra Peanut story arc. Go figure.

name: chaesar
text: Poor Beef has the self-esteem of a moldy gym sock dipped in sadness.

name: dougthehead
text: The perfect characterization of Roast Beef continues

name: lateadopter
text: So many strips ring so true.  Then there are the ones that actually happened to me.

name: tinhand
text: This is just a superb snap-shot of Roast Beefs character. It's also one that exhibits a lack of confidence and self-worth that a lot of people can identify with. This is one of the only ones I've had on my desktop

name: yossarianlives
text: Thank god he did not get his wish

name: crinklebat
text: Wow, crazy to read this when he just got engaged to Molly today.

name: rykan
text: Crazy to read this when he had his bachelor party today.

name: zapatos
text: Crazy to read this after Molly leaft him today, after he helped her get here from heaven/wales and everything.

name: hendetta
text: Roast Beef is completely selfless.

name: aelindil
text: There is a large difference between selfless and self-deprecating.

name: mashisoyo
text: Beef is both, in this strip.

name: epicurus
text: Love this one so much. I would marry it, at least until it got its business degree.

name: lereya
text: Given Beef's current Circumstances, this is 5'd so hard.

name: hyetal
text: Gets a 5 from me based on the alt text.

name: c_dizzle
text: Oh my god, Beef is channeling my college chemistry professors love life! (How do I know this?...shut up)

name: themacktruck
text: Isn't 'stad's wife chinese?  This seems to have grim implications for the future.

name: professorhazard
text: Is Onstad the kind of person who would do this? It is unclear.

name: snowman
text: It is a given that since she is Chinese, she is only interested in a better future through U.S. citizenship.

name: soticoto
text: Beef is such a realist it hurts... like being quartered by your nails.

name: morypcaina
text:
"At the core of this idea is a generosity and compassion lacking in many marriages"

Right on.

name: jthm_guitarist
text: Second panel = win.

name: mr_lostman28
text: A comment left by mr_lostman28 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by emeraldemon, mtrott, mystkmanat, yomimono)

name: fireking
text: Contrary to Beef's initial wishes, his wedding was not as he forsaw.

name: chexmix
text: I wish I could have the 2nd panel as a t-shirt. Maybe a woman would take pity on me. Except she'd need to be blind, and then she couldn't read it.

name: tekende
text: I am currently dating a girl who is completely half Chinese and stuff

name: zapatos
text: How did your date go Tekende, well?

name: tekende
text: It went well.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I really like this conversation. Seriously.

It went well.

name: unclemikey
text: Every time Beef gets like this I call my friend who is exactly like him to see if he's OK.

name: fancyrat
text: God dammit Onstad, when will you stop thinking like us?

name: kennisiou
text: In the future, Beef instead marries a cat he met in heaven.  I think things turned out for the better of him.

name: greenkoolayd
text: its a double-edged sword that 'beef wants to be the go-to-guy and the reliable one.  looking outside of yourself/helping people with worse issues than yours is a great way to gain perspective and cope with depression.  on the other hand, he could easily become a victim if someone wanted to take advantage of his big heart and his giving-ness.

name: puguglypress
text: Your mom takes advantage of my giving-ness

name: greenkoolayd
text: out of pity, im sure.

name: mashisoyo
text: I think this may be my favourite alt-text.
